query: WITH entities AS (SELECT obligation_id, id FROM core_payments WHERE ((obligation_id = $1) AND (COALESCE(id < $3, true))) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: PaymentId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_payment_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
